title: --Beer-- DrScaramouche's Stuff & Things
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[>]]
[[include component:ratio-bar base=--]]
[[/>]]


Hi. I'm an author with a huge case of imposter syndrome, but was finally convinced to make an author's page in order to make getting my tags on the discord easier.


--The name comes from Beerswain, which should be my username, if I ever get brave enough to change it on the wiki. Otherwise, I am [[*user DrScaramouche]].--

edit: Fuck it. Long Live Scaramouche MD.

edit #2: Did you know strikethrough doesn't work in page titles? Now you do!

[[tabview]]

[[tab 144-Hour Jamcon 2 (2020)]]

**Themes**: EXPLOSIONS / Delicious / More Than Meets The Eye
**Podiums**: Third, //Theme 3 Top Tales//

------

My gift that I received from [[*user Cassandra Prime]]. I gave them the impossible task of writing for my author avatar, with the twist that //I// haven't even written for my author avatar. Also, they took my love for penguins and //ran// with it. I love it so much. :3

[[tab Things I Didn't Write]]
I helped [[*user UtyLike]] with localizing the English, as well as tightening up the narrative. There's more of a collab-style version of this floating around out there somewhere which we never ended up posting; if I find it, I'll link it here for posterity.
